author: stoddard
msg: Get apache -k restart -n apache2 working reliabily again.

author: rbb
msg: Remove all signal handling from the worker MPM's child processes.  Instead,
we use the pipe of death for all communication between parent and child.

author: gregames
msg: accept() error handling should be OK now.
I don't have a strong opinion on what we should do if the parent dies, now
that we don't have a real life example of that any more.  It was a little
confusing at first, but OTOH it kept serving requests.

author: gregames
msg: prefork shouldn't be killing its parent if a child runs out of resources.

author: joes
msg: Workaround for Mozilla empty file uploads (missing a CRLF).
Also includes a bugfix: DISABLE_UPLOADS should allow
multipart/form-data posts that don't contain file upload fields.
